name: Fixed Research Assistant
config_yaml:
# Student Research Assistant v4 - Fixed Configuration
# Addresses common VAPI tool integration issues

A:
  name: "Student Research Assistant v4 - Fixed"
  model:
    provider: "openai"
    model: "gpt-4o-mini"
    temperature: 0.7
    max_tokens: 1500
    messages:
      - role: "system"
        content: |
          You are a knowledgeable research assistant specializing in helping students with academic research and content generation.
          
          IMPORTANT: When you use any of your tools (quick_research, comprehensive_research, or generate_content), you MUST:
          1. Always read and process the complete tool result
          2. Provide a comprehensive response based on the tool's output
          3. Never ignore or dismiss tool results
          4. Always acknowledge what information you found through your tools
          
          Your capabilities include:
          - Conducting comprehensive research using your research tools
          - Generating high-quality academic content
          - Providing quick research insights for immediate answers
          - Helping with study materials, assignments, and project planning
          
          When a user asks for research or content generation:
          1. Use the appropriate tool immediately
          2. Wait for the tool result
          3. Present the information from the tool result in a clear, organized manner
          4. Add your own analysis or context if helpful
          
          Communication style:
          - Be conversational yet professional
          - Always use the information provided by your tools
          - Show enthusiasm for learning and discovery
          - Provide actionable insights based on tool results

  voice:
    provider: "11labs"
    voiceId: "21m00Tcm4TlvDq8ikWAM"
    speed: 1.0
    stability: 0.75

  firstMessage: "Hi! I'm your Student Research Assistant with powerful research tools. I can help you with comprehensive research, quick fact-checking, and generating academic content. What topic would you like to explore today?"

  server:
    url: "http://localhost:8000/webhook/tool-call"

tools:
  - name: "quick_research"
    description: "Perform quick research on a specific topic or question for immediate insights. This tool will provide you with research results that you should read and present to the user."
    parameters:
      type: "object"
      properties:
        query:
          type: "string"
          description: "The research query or topic to investigate"
        focus_area:
          type: "string"
          description: "Specific area to focus on (optional)"
      required: ["query"]
    function:
      name: "quick_research"
      description: "Perform quick research and return detailed results"
      parameters:
        type: "object"
        properties:
          query:
            type: "string"
            description: "The research query or topic to investigate"
          focus_area:
            type: "string"
            description: "Specific area to focus on (optional)"
        required: ["query"]

  - name: "comprehensive_research"
    description: "Conduct detailed, comprehensive research with multiple sources and in-depth analysis. This tool will provide you with extensive research results that you should read and present to the user."
    parameters:
      type: "object"
      properties:
        topic:
          type: "string"
          description: "The main research topic"
        research_depth:
          type: "string"
          enum: ["basic", "intermediate", "advanced"]
          description: "Depth of research required"
        specific_questions:
          type: "array"
          items:
            type: "string"
          description: "Specific questions to address in the research (optional)"
      required: ["topic"]
    function:
      name: "comprehensive_research"
      description: "Conduct comprehensive research and return detailed results"
      parameters:
        type: "object"
        properties:
          topic:
            type: "string"
            description: "The main research topic"
          research_depth:
            type: "string"
            enum: ["basic", "intermediate", "advanced"]
            description: "Depth of research required"
          specific_questions:
            type: "array"
            items:
              type: "string"
            description: "Specific questions to address in the research (optional)"
        required: ["topic"]

  - name: "generate_content"
    description: "Generate academic content like essays, summaries, reports, or outlines. This tool will provide you with generated content that you should read and present to the user."
    parameters:
      type: "object"
      properties:
        content_type:
          type: "string"
          enum: ["essay", "summary", "report", "outline", "analysis", "article"]
          description: "Type of content to generate"
        topic:
          type: "string"
          description: "Main topic or subject"
        length:
          type: "string"
          enum: ["short", "medium", "long"]
          description: "Desired length of content"
        academic_level:
          type: "string"
          enum: ["high_school", "undergraduate", "graduate"]
          description: "Academic level for appropriate complexity (optional)"
        tone:
          type: "string"
          enum: ["academic", "professional", "conversational"]
          description: "Tone of the content (optional)"
      required: ["content_type", "topic"]
    function:
      name: "generate_content"
      description: "Generate academic content and return the results"
      parameters:
        type: "object"
        properties:
          content_type:
            type: "string"
            enum: ["essay", "summary", "report", "outline", "analysis", "article"]
            description: "Type of content to generate"
          topic:
            type: "string"
            description: "Main topic or subject"
          length:
            type: "string"
            enum: ["short", "medium", "long"]
            description: "Desired length of content"
          academic_level:
            type: "string"
            enum: ["high_school", "undergraduate", "graduate"]
            description: "Academic level for appropriate complexity (optional)"
          tone:
            type: "string"
            enum: ["academic", "professional", "conversational"]
            description: "Tone of the content (optional)"
        required: ["content_type", "topic"]
